title: FPS locked at 30
body: Alright to start this off, yes vsync and everything like it that would affect fps is turned off. The FPS is stuck at 30 and won't move. I actually had one game where it was stuck at 48 fps for some reason. I got a new laptop for christmas that I would be able to use at school and game with while traveling. It's a Dell Inspiron 15 7000. It has a gtx 960m, an intel core I7 6700HQ, 16 gb of DDR 3 ram. Simply put, I should be able to run League at over 100 fps easy. Any help?

replies.body:
Since it's likely that your laptop is running Windows 10, this may be caused by the Windows Game Bar that ships with Windows 10. A while ago, there was a Windows 10 anniversary update that enabled a feature called *Game DVR* inside the Windows Game Bar. This feature has caused low fps for some players while causing complete system freezes for others. I strongly recommend you disable this feature using [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), in case this was part of the problem.

Please let me know if those steps caused any change for you.

It's not just low fps. Like it's locked at 30 and will not move. But I will try and let you know.
Edit: Yeah it didn't work :( Any other suggestions?

Damn, I was hoping that was it!

The other common causes of these framerate issues are problematic display drivers and inefficient Windows power settings. Our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) will walk you through the rest of the basic steps I recommend taking in order to resolve this.

Hit me up if your issues persist through those changes.

I tried those, and none worked. It's not low fps. It's just that it's locked at 30 and will not move. It's not like its performance is lacking or its having trouble running it. Something is capping the fps at 30 for some reason.

Since the most common solutions for your locked FPS haven't been able to resolve this just yet, we'll need to take a look at your system logs to troubleshoot this further. I'd like you to use our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab those logs, which you can then attach to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can get back to you.

Let me know if you ran into any issues with those steps.
